entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -6.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections early in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
